properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTENTS WHERE CONTENT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT CONTENT_NO , CONTENT_TYPE , CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , PLACE , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , INFO , CONTENT_STATUS , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , REGION , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH FROM CONTENTS WHERE CONTENT_STATUS='Y')A)B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT PLAY_START , PLAY_END , PLAY_RUNTIME , ROUND_COUNT , ROUND_NO FROM PLAY P JOIN ROUND R ON(P.CONTENT_NO = R.CONTENT_NO) WHERE P.CONTENT_NO = ?
SELECT EXHIBITION_START , EXHIBITION_END FROM EXHIBITON WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
SELECT CONCERT_DATE , CONCERT_RUNTIME FROM CONCERT WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?

INSERT INTO CONTENTS ( CONTENT_NO , CONTENT_TYPE , CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , PLACE , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , INFO , REGION , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.NEXTVAL , '연극' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO PLAY ( CONTENT_NO , PLAY_START , PLAY_END , PLAY_RUNTIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.CURRVAL , TO_DATE(?) , TO_DATE(?) , ? )

INSERT INTO ROUND ( ROUND_NO , ROUND_COUNT , ROUND_DATE , ROUND_START , ROUND_END , ROUND_MAX , CONTENT_NO , ROUND_SEATS ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROUNDNO.NEXTVAL , ? , TO_DATE(?) , ? , ? , ? , SEQ_CONTENTSNO.CURRVAL , ? )

INSERT INTO CONTENTS ( CONTENT_NO , CONTENT_TYPE , CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , PLACE , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , INFO , REGION , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.NEXTVAL , '콘서트' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO CONCERT ( CONTENT_NO , CONCERT_DATE , CONCERT_RUNTIME , CONCERT_MAX , CONCERT_SEATS , CONCERT_START , CONCERT_END ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.CURRVAL , TO_DATE(?) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO CONTENTS ( CONTENT_NO , CONTENT_TYPE , CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , PLACE , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , INFO , REGION , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.NEXTVAL , '전시' , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO EXHIBITON ( CONTENT_NO , EXHIBITION_START , EXHIBITION_END ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTENTSNO.CURRVAL , TO_DATE(?) , TO_DATE(?) )

SELECT CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , PLAY_START , PLAY_END , ROUND_COUNT , ROUND_DATE , PLAY_RUNTIME , ROUND_START , ROUND_END , ROUND_MAX , PLACE , REGION , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , INFO , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH FROM CONTENTS C JOIN PLAY P ON (C.CONTENT_NO = P.CONTENT_NO) JOIN ROUND R ON(C.CONTENT_NO=R.CONTENT_NO) WHERE C.CONTENT_NO = ? AND R.ROUND_NO = ?

SELECT CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , EXHIBITION_START , EXHIBITION_END , PLACE , INFO , REGION , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH FROM CONTENTS C JOIN EXHIBITON E ON(C.CONTENT_NO=E.CONTENT_NO) WHERE C.CONTENT_NO = ?

SELECT CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_SUBJECT , CONCERT_DATE , CONCERT_START , CONCERT_END , CONCERT_MAX , PLACE , REGION , CONCERT_RUNTIME , INFO , LIMIT , PRICE , CONTENT_KEYWORD , CONTENT_OGIMG , CONTENT_CHIMG , CONTENT_IMGPATH FROM CONTENTS C JOIN CONCERT CC ON (C.CONTENT_NO=CC.CONTENT_NO) WHERE C.CONTENT_NO = ?

UPDATE CONTENTS SET CONTENT_TITLE = ? , CONTENT_SUBJECT = ? , PLACE = ? , LIMIT = ? , PRICE = ? , CONTENT_KEYWORD = ? , INFO = ? , REGION = ? , CONTENT_OGIMG = ? , CONTENT_CHIMG = ? , CONTENT_IMGPATH = ? WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE PLAY SET PLAY_START = TO_DATE(?) , PLAY_END = TO_DATE(?) , PLAY_RUNTIME = ? WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE ROUND SET ROUND_COUNT =? , ROUND_DATE = TO_DATE(?) , ROUND_START = ? , ROUND_END = ? , ROUND_MAX = ? WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE CONCERT SET CONCERT_DATE = ? , CONCERT_RUNTIME = ? , CONCERT_MAX = ? , CONCERT_START = ? , CONCERT_END = ? WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE EXHIBITON SET EXHIBITION_START = ? , EXHIBITION_END = ? WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE CONTENTS SET CONTENT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE PLAY SET PLAY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE EXHIBITON SET EXHIBITION_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
UPDATE CONCERT SET CONCERT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CONTENT_NO = ?
